com.code_connoisseure.space_invaders.enteties.projectiles

Class Projectile

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.code_connoisseure.space_invaders.enteties.AnimatedBoxGameObject
      • com.code_connoisseure.space_invaders.enteties.projectiles.Projectile
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Bomb, DefaultLaser

    public abstract class Projectile
extends AnimatedBoxGameObject
    This abstract class represents a basic projectile and contains all functionality necessary to move it upwards across the screen.
    Author:
    Yannic Wehner

    • Constructor Detail

      • Projectile

        public Projectile(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Texture spriteSheet,
                  float x,
                  float y,
                  int sheetFrameWidth,
                  int sheetFrameHeight,
                  float animationDuration,
                  float speed,
                  AnimatedBoxGameObject.Directions moveDirection)
        Parameters:
        spriteSheet - A texture containing the frames of the projectile animation.
        x - The x-position of the upper left corner of the projectile in the Cartesian coordinate system.
        y - The y-position of the upper left corner of the projectile in the Cartesian coordinate system.
        sheetFrameWidth - The width of a single animation frame in the spriteSheet in pixels.
        sheetFrameHeight - The height of a single animation frame in the spriteSheet in pixels.
        animationDuration - The time in seconds a single animation cycle will take.
        speed - The amount of pixels the projectile moves with each call of the move method in a given direction.
        moveDirection - The direction the projectile will traverse in.

      • Projectile

        public Projectile(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Texture spriteSheet,
                  float x,
                  float y,
                  int sheetFrameWidth,
                  int sheetFrameHeight,
                  float animationDuration,
                  float speed,
                  AnimatedBoxGameObject.Directions moveDirection,
                  com.badlogic.gdx.audio.Sound fireSound)
        Parameters:
        spriteSheet - A texture containing the frames of the projectile animation.
        x - The x-position of the upper left corner of the object in the Cartesian coordinate system.
        y - The y-position of the upper left corner of the projectile in the Cartesian coordinate system.
        sheetFrameWidth - The width of a single animation frame in the spriteSheet in pixels.
        sheetFrameHeight - The height of a single animation frame in the spriteSheet in pixels.
        animationDuration - The time in seconds a single animation cycle will take.
        speed - The amount of pixels the projectile moves with each call of the move method in a given direction.
        moveDirection - The direction the projectile will traverse in.
        fireSound - The sound that will be played when the projectile is fired.

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public void update(float delta)
        Prepares the collision box for further changes, updates the object animation based on delta and moves the object.
        Overrides:
        update in class AnimatedBoxGameObject
        Parameters:
        delta - Provided by mini2Dx. The time span between the current frame and the last frame in seconds. Might be smoothed over n frames.

      • playFireSound

        public boolean playFireSound()
        Plays the fire sound
        Returns:
        Returns whether or not the sound could be played.

      • moveInBounds

        protected boolean moveInBounds(AnimatedBoxGameObject.Directions xDirection,
                               AnimatedBoxGameObject.Directions yDirection)
        Checks if the planned move is legal.
        Overrides:
        moveInBounds in class AnimatedBoxGameObject
        Parameters:
        xDirection - The x-direction the object should move in.
        yDirection - The y-direction the object should move in.
        Returns:
        Returns true because move will always be in bounds.
